programme.title: Brooklyn’s Best Pizza Tour
programme.desc: Frankie tries the best Brooklyn pizza from Neo-Neapolitan to coal oven pies, new toppings, & Italian classics.

programme.title: BBQ Bowls & Puffy Tacos in San Antonio
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza tries San Antonio’s best brunch, epic puffy tacos, colorful conchitas, & BBQ Thai curry bowls.

programme.title: Dumplings, Steam Buns, and Dim Sum, Oh My!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, one brother will live like a king, while the other will check out the city’s street food scene.

programme.title: Simplicity vs. Splendor on the Seaside
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Soaking in the beauty and elegance of the French Riviera, Marko and Alex are in Nice to enjoy the simplicity and splendor of this seaside city.

programme.title: Keep Austin Weird
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In the state capital of Texas, Marko and Alex see what Austin has to offer. An eclectic city known for its music and cuisine, the guys brave the Texas heat and check out what keeps Austin weird.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex find themselves in the prosperous and pristine city of Geneva, Switzerland. A city nestled alongside a beautiful glacier-fed lake, the guys will explore the riches Geneva has to offer.

programme.title: The Thriving Traditions of Taipei
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.title: The Lion's Share of Lyon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex head to Lyon, France, a city known for its gastronomy and endless history.

programme.title: Oceanside in Okinawa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Ocean breeze, turquoise waters and a whole lot of amazing cuisine. Marko and Alex are soaking up that island life in Okinawa, Japan and learning what makes it so unique.

programme.title: Genoa From Above and Below
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In Genoa, the brothers cruise the streets, while one of them gets a taste for the lavish lifestyle of Italy's Northwestern port. They take in all the views: heads in the clouds on a high-flying funicular, and just above water at the local aquarium.

programme.title: The L.A. Lifestyle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Green juice, avocado toast, and surfers galore. Marko and Alex are back home in Los Angeles to explore their town, staycation style. From downtown to the beach, the guys do everything fun under the sun in the city of angels.

programme.title: Origins to Originals
programme.desc: From roast chicken to smash burgers to hot sauce, Stephanie sees cooks remixing classics from their heritage.

programme.title: Home Cooking
programme.desc: Stephanie Izard meets cooks finding ingenious ways to serve mouth-watering food out of their houses.

programme.title: Family Style
programme.desc: Stephanie Izard meets multi-gen families taking mom’s recipes and turning them into smash hit food business.

programme.title: Unique Eats
programme.desc: From Mexitalian pasta and functional cocktails to whole roasted goats, Stephanie hits one-of-a-kind eateries.

programme.title: Comfort Foods
programme.desc: Stephanie's shown what comfort means to 3 very different cooks who have taken inspiration from their youth.

programme.title: Secret Pizza
programme.desc: From mystery popups & secret menus to limited drops & van pizza, Stephanie explores L.A.’s hidden pizza scene.

programme.title: Origins to Originals
programme.desc: From roast chicken to smash burgers to hot sauce, Stephanie sees cooks remixing classics from their heritage.

programme.desc: Today on Offroad & Fun, enjoy a mix of rally, rallycross, and acrobatics.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: An angry bull, a few English people prepared for the weather and a young, talented race driver - tourists will be venturing down to the infamous 'green hell' of the Nuerburgring.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: A tuned-up Golf 2, a family sedan from Hannover, Germany and a very special Porsche GT2.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: The Nuerburgring has transformed into a winter wonderland. Although it looks pretty, it is not pretty to use as a race track.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: Fog, rain and snow means that a visit to the Eifel region isn't that pleasant.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: The first Grand Cherokee under Fiat.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: All the latest in car presentations, new technology and cutting-edge tests from the auto industry.

programme.desc: All the latest in car presentations, new technology and cutting-edge tests from the auto industry.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Featuring the Porsche Boxter and the Volkwagon Passat Alltrack.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: All the latest in car presentations, new technology and cutting-edge tests from the auto industry.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Selling more than a million cars per year, Audi is now one of the most successful car manufacturers in the world. The brand with the four rings stands for innovation, superior technology and outstanding design.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The history of auto unions.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: At a time when horses and carriages characterized traffic, visionaries like Henry Ford were working on the mobility of tomorrow. His ideas and approaches have a major share of the individual mobilization in the world.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Remember the first Beetle? When did Ferdinand Porsche design this people's car? Follow the evolution of the automobile over the last century.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The 24 Hours of Le Mans are the toughest race in the world. In 1951 Porsche took part in the 24 hour-classic for the very first time and competed every year ever since. Till 1998 the Porsche enjoyed 16 victories with its prototypes.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Even in the world of super sports cars, people get goose bumps if they hear the name Lamborghini; all over the world, these fighting bulls from Italy are famous for their spectacular design and massive power.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Porsche Cayenne Turbo and the Range Rover Supercharged are big, fast and have a lot of power, so they can even take on sports cars; the interiors of these cars feel like a luxurious living room.

programme.title: Super Cars
programme.desc: The Tushek TS600, a super sports car built in Austria, was limited to 33 units, extremely light and had a power/weight ratio that is on the level of GT3 racing cars.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Almost every car manufacturer has their own tuning company, where models improve in performance and get a sportier look. However, for many customers this is not enough. Individuality is the key.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Nissan's all-wheel monster GT-R and the Porsche 911 with a turbo engine are tested for winter suitability in the Finnish Lapland.

programme.title: Porsche Cayman GT4
programme.desc: The Porsche Cayman GT4 is lighter, more powerful and faster than previous models; Porsche demonstrates its capabilities for achieving fast lap times.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: Vintage cars as an investment.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: Featuring the BMW 328 Schluter.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: Revisiting the past to portray the classic and veteran cars of decades gone by, meeting the personalities who wrote automotive history, and sending very old cars running round very fast circuits.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.desc: A portrait of the driver and stuntman.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.desc: Touratech embarks on a journey to Mount Kailash, Tibet.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.desc: The Triumph Street Triple and the Kawasaki Z750 are featured.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.desc: Motorcycles

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.desc: Showdown at the track: The KTM Superduke against the Honda CB1000R.

programme.title: Harley bike tour through the desert of Dubai
programme.desc: There isn't just heat and drought in the UAE; this country is a true paradise for bikers; a two-day trip from Dubai to Oman on motorcycle.

programme.title: Racetrack 2024, Part 13
programme.desc: Today on Racetrack, experience the thrilling motorcycle racing series King of the Roads.

programme.title: Racetrack 2024, Part 13
programme.desc: Today on Racetrack, experience the thrilling motorcycle racing series King of the Roads.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Follows W Motors as they present their prototype of the Lykan HyperSport at the Dubai Motor Show, where the twin turbo flat six 770 hp engine comes alive as a fully assembled car for the first time.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The 340 hp Porsche Cayman GTS is taken for a ride around the island of Mallorca; also, a look at the Corvette C7 and Nissan 370 Z Nismo.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: If you started a family and had to say goodbye to your beloved sports car, there's no reason to cry, because you can still get a bit of a racing feeling with a station wagon.

programme.title: Alpina B6
programme.desc: An Alpina is optically never intrusive; huge spoilers are not used and neither are striking power domes; any modifications serve the technical improvement, for example, optimized cooling and aerodynamics.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: 4x4 shows viewers the real off-road lifestyle. A look at the first Rallye Defender at Europe's biggest all wheel drive exhibition.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: When winter is coming, you have a lot of advantages with an all-wheel vehicle. There is traction even when the road is slippery. For the driver this means not only more safety but also more fun behind the wheel.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Featuring the Subaru WRX STI.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The Arabella Classics is one of the most exclusive classic car rallies in Europe.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Kati and Patrick from Munich are huge fanas of US cars and proud owners of a 1972 Chevrolet Chevelle. But they are no longer satisfied with its 5.7-liter small block and want to buy a bigger engine.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Paaren / Glien near Berlin is host to the yearly Oldtimer Show. It attracts around 45,000 visitors, who are able to gaze at more than 5000 automobile treasures. Frank and his crew from Special Cars Berlin attend the event.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: With more than 500 supercars from Lamborghini, Ferrari or expensive brands like Bugatti and Koenigsegg, Germany is home to the world's largest Supercars Rallye. Participants can look forward to action-packed stages.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Paul has to slide underneath an exploding vehicle, while Anna is catapulted in the air.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: One stuntman has to go head over heels in his car, while two colleagues combine a car chase with a fistfight.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Stuntmen operate an Artega GT at full speed with a remote control.

programme.title: Bentley S2 Continental Flying Spur
programme.desc: Flowing lines and an elegance that is unmatched; the 1959 Bentley S2 Continental Flying Spur aims to build bridges in the company's model range; from the sporty origin of the brand to the luxury of its new owner, Rolls Royce.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Smart offers its iconic city car with a convertible option; the Mini cabriolet is bigger and provides room for four people; when it comes to roadster feeling, the Mazda MX-5 is on top of the list.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: The Paris Motor Show features the automotive world of tomorrow; in 2016, Mercedes-Benz introduced their Generation EQ and Volkswagen announced the making of 20 new electrified models by 2020.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: The coupe form makes cars sexy. But it is a question of faith - and in part a question of value - whether to opt for a more traditional two-door coupe, like the Mercedes E400, or its bigger brother, the CLS with four doors.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Every year 150,000 petrol heads travel to the Nevada dessert to attend the SEMA in Las Vegas, the biggest and best-known tuning exhibition in the world. Among them is motoring journalist Kati. She meets with tuning expert Dirk Hattenh.

programme.title: MotorStories

programme.title: Winter Games Obsidian - Park Jam
programme.desc: Winter Games NZ is the Southern Hemisphere’s biggest snow sports event. It welcomes the world’s best skiers and snowboarders to compete in the opening of the FIS Park and Pipe World Cup season and The North Face Frontier.

programme.title: Episode 41
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 41

programme.title: Cerro Torre Fly & Climb
programme.desc: The West Face route with its long glacier approach through the Circo de los Altares certainly feels ‘out there’. That the whole team were able to take off from the summit with their paragliders is a testament to their skill, both as climbers and as pilots.

programme.title: One Water Race 2024
programme.desc: The concept is straight forward; starting at Arholma in the north, the first to reach Landsort in the south is crowned the winner. Running and swimming the only method of movement. No track and free choice of route but with some unknown check points needed to pass along the way.

programme.title: Roc d’Azur 2024
programme.desc: With the aim of bringing cycling to as many people as possible in France, CIC has become a title partner of the Roc d'Azur, Europe's leading mountain bike event, which attracts almost 100,000 enthusiasts, participants and aficionados every year!

programme.title: MIT100 - Triathlon Mauritius
programme.desc: The "MIT100 - Mauritius International Triathlon" is a prestigious annual triathlon event held in Mauritius. It attracts athletes from around the world, offering a challenging course with a 1.8 km swim, a 55 km bike ride, and a 12 km run.

programme.title: Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 - Live delayed (Vert/Bowl/Street) Part 3
programme.desc: The Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 celebrates its 30th anniversary at the legendary Štvanice Island Skatepark. This international skateboarding event welcomes over 180 riders from all over the world to compete in the street, bowl and vert disciplines.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Cauipe (BRA)
programme.desc: The Cauipe lagoon is the venue for the Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. The Brazilian paradise offers the perfect playground for explosive tricks.

programme.title: GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup - Dunkerque (FRA)
programme.desc: Dunkerque is the venue for the GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. Athletes from all over the world compete for the title and show impressive tricks, power moves and technical skills.

programme.title: Desert Dash Namibia 2024
programme.desc: The Desert Dash 2024 is an exhilarating mountain biking event that challenges riders to conquer the breathtaking terrain of the Namib Desert. Spanning over 24 hours, participants embark on a grueling 369-kilometer journey.

programme.title: FIA World Championship – Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge - 52min Highlight Show
programme.desc: The FIA World Championship - Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge 2025 is a motorsport event in the breathtaking desert of the United Arab Emirates. With world-class drivers and riders, participants tackle challenging dunes and rugged terrain.

programme.title: Mission Steeps
programme.desc: Xavier De Le Rue and Sam Anthamatten are known for bringing speed and fluidity into the big mountain environment. Following Mission Antarctic, Mission Steeps is the second chapter of the Mission Series.

programme.title: Alaska or Bus´t - Profile Andrew Taylor
programme.desc: Alaska, one of the most sparsely populated areas in the world, has always been a dream-riding destination for American mountain biker Andrew Taylor. But being over 3,000 miles away from his hometown, it seemed a bit too far to just jump in the truck and go.

programme.title: FIA - Pure Motorsport "Documentary | The Restart"
programme.desc: Covid-19 brought the world of motorsport to a complete standstill. However, this standstill was overcome through the joint effort and passion of volunteers, promoters, teams, drivers and FIA officials. They managed the successful RESTART.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 3 & 4 - Germany
programme.desc: Welcome to WES rounds 3 and 4 of the UCI E-Mountainbike Cross-Country World Cup presented by Schwalbe. We are in Bielstein, Germany, for the second year in a row and the Bielstein Forest Course is the venue for this event and one of Europe's oldest motocross circuits.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 5 & 6 - Belgium
programme.desc: Welcome to WES World E-Bike Series Round 5 and 6. We are at Spa-Francorchamps, in Belgium, the iconic circuit, for this event presented by EICMA. The UCI E-Mountain Bike Cross-Country World Cup comes to the spectacular woods of this world-famous venue for the third year

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing in the World’s most diverse terrain, exploring all four corners of the island, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 7 & 8 - Monaco
programme.desc: Hello and welcome to WES World E-Bike Series Round 7 and 8. For the first time since 2019, the Monaco - Alpes-Maritimes Round will welcome the Season Finale, this time with a brand new track in the French area of Turini, and the much awaited awards ceremony.

programme.title: Catch the Moment - Profile Robbie Maddison
programme.desc: Robbie Maddison began his career competing in national motocross competitions. On New Year's Eve 2007, the 40th anniversary of Evel Knievel's legendary jump over the Caesar's Palace fountain, the Australian broke the world record in the bicycle long jump with his bicycle

programme.title: WOF 2024 #44: Titan Desert Series 2024 - Almeria (ESP)
programme.desc: The rugged landscapes of Almería, Spain, hosts one of the most challenging mountain bike races in the world - the Škoda Titan Desert Series. Over rocky trails and under the scorching Spanish sun, elite riders push their limits in this multi-stage endurance race.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #51: Skoda Titan Desert Series - Neom (KSA)
programme.desc: In today´s episode the Titan Desert 2024 in NEOM, Saudi Arabia, challenges mountain bikers with intense desert terrains, combining endurance, competition, and stunning landscapes in a unique event showcasing one of the world’s most innovative regions.

programme.title: Keep On Keeping On
programme.desc: Keep On Keeping On - Dreaming of Rampage portraits Johny Salidos career and his long way to compete at the Rampage - the holy grail of freeride mountainbiking.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2024 - Prologue
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 5 - Patagonia,Alaska & Pakistan
programme.desc: Stephan Siegrist climbs all the summits of the Cerro Torre group in Patagonia / The Ataraxia Mammut Proteam wanted to climb Mt. Marcus Baker with kitesupport in Alaska / David Lama intends to climb the 6,251 meter peak of Trango Tower in Pakistan

programme.title: North Face Expedition 2011 - Gasherbrum II
programme.desc: Winter ascent of an eight-thousander in Pakistan's Karakoram Mountains: three extreme mountaineers survived this adventure with the successful historic first ascent of Gasherbrum II (8,034 m) in winter.

programme.title: Mammut Project 360 Grad
programme.desc: "Project360" takes digital mapping into the third dimension and makes the legendary Eiger North Face a virtual experience. A view through the eyes of the climber, directly from the wall. The impressive 360° panorama of the walls: www.project360.mammut.ch

programme.title: FIA Karting Grand Prix - European Karting Championship
programme.desc: Karting is a great life school for young people. The FIA Karting Championships are open to drivers aged 12 and over and there is no upper age limit.

programme.title: FIA – Intercontinental Drifting Cup 2021
programme.desc: In todays Episode we´re pulling the handbreak tight and put the pedal to the medal with the best professional drift driver. The Intercontinental Drifting Cup took place in Riga, Lativa this year. Cars up to 850 horse powers and a challenging track!

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs
programme.desc: The Red Bull Romaniacs Extreme Enduro Rally is open! From today until Saturday, the best hard enduro riders will take on the toughest rally in the world in Romania! The Red Bull Romaniacs takes place every year and attracts participants from around 50 countries.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile - Ildiko Wermescher
programme.desc: Ultramarathon, also called ultra distance, is any sporting event involving running and walking further than in traditional 42 kilometer marathon. The Mammut athlete Ildiko Wermerscher reflects us her inspiration and motivation for this extreme sport.

programme.title: Mammut Athlete Profile - Ildiko Wermescher
programme.desc: Ultramarathon, also called ultra distance, is any sporting event involving running and walking further than in traditional 42 kilometer marathon. The Mammut athlete Ildiko Wermerscher reflects us her inspiration and motivation for this extreme sport.

programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 42

programme.title: Golden Fly Series Genf (SUI) 2024 - Part 1
programme.desc: Geneva will host the Golden Fly Series 2024 athletics spectacle for the first time! On Saturday 21 Sep, the world's best long jumpers and pole vaulters will be competing for important world ranking points on the largest mobile World Athletics-certified athletics facility in the world.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #04: Queen & King of the Court #04
programme.desc: The sands of Doha are set to witness the grand finale of the 2023 Queen & King of the Court Crown Series, marking the culmination of a thrilling series of events that kicked off in Miami earlier this year.

programme.title: A Plea For Refuge
programme.desc: Two adventurous friends, Jeff Shapiro and Cody Tuttle, have a desire to experience one of the last, raw, and truly preserved wilderness areas on the North American continent, attempt to hike and fly paraglider's across the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Highlight Show BMX
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the world's largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.desc: “Catch the Moment” portrays athletes from all over the world such as American longboard surfer Kassia Meador. She is considered one of the most stylish professional longboarders, but has also made a name for herself as a photographer

programme.title: Engadinsnow
programme.desc: ENGADINSNOW is one of the longest-running freeride competitions in the Alps. Apart from its long tradition, this event classic has always been all about innovation.

programme.title: LAAX OPEN 2021 - Slopestyle & Halfpipe World Cup - News
programme.desc: The LAAX OPEN 2021 takes place from 19-23 January 2021, kicking off the FIS Snowboard World Cup Tour 20/21 in the disciplines Slopestyle and Halfpipe and is endowed with 140,000 CHF prize money.

programme.title: Bike2Boat
programme.desc: In the Bike 2 Boat adventurewe set off on a climate-neutral journey through the Alps together with four kayakers. We will accompany them on their search for extraordinary kayak spots and unforgettable experiences.

programme.title: Far Away
programme.desc: Matthias Haunholder and Matthias Mayr present a big mountain freeski film, primarily shot in Austria. Through stunning ski footage and heartfelt interviews, the film explores the intense emotions of parents and loved ones as they cope with the risks faced by the skiers.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #50: Profile Marko Grilc
programme.desc: Diese Folge widmen wir dem legendären Snowboarder Marko Grilc. Sei dabei, wenn wir das Leben und die Leistungen dieser Ikone der Snowboardwelt feiern. Macht euch bereit für eine herzliche Reise durch das bemerkenswerte Vermächtnis von Marko Grilc.

programme.desc: The film “Fascination of Ski Mountaineering” shows four top Austrian athletes doing high-alpine ski mountaineering from the Mittelbergjoch over the Taschach Glacier to the Wildspitze.

programme.title: Alpine Rollercoaster
programme.desc: Dani Arnold from Bürglen in Switzerland is now one of the most renowned climbers in Europe. The project that made Dani famous was the speed record on the largest north face in Western Europe, the Eiger.

programme.title: Deepline - Lukas Irmler
programme.desc: Today we accompany German highliner Lukas Irmler and his friends on their expedition into one of the deepest caves in the world - and experience how they cross the lowest slackline ever!

programme.title: FIA Karting Grand Prix - World Championship
programme.desc: Karting is the best for future car champions and is also practiced by enthusiasts who dedicate all their energy to it. The FIA Karting Championships are open to drivers aged 12 and over and there is no upper age limit.

programme.desc: Sarka and Cheryl, who haven't seen each other in years, have decided to reunite and embark on a tour of their own. Having once traveled together on the contest scene for over 15 years, life led them to different corners of the West Coast of America.

programme.title: Swissway to Heaven
programme.desc: Swissway to Heaven is a film about multi-pitch climbing in the swiss alps.The dokumentary portraits the history and evolution of climbing in Swizerland aswell as Cedric Lachat's adventure climbing all 5 big walls of the swiss alps.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #06: GKA World Tour Season Wrap Up
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour has just wrapped up a record-breaking year packed with drama and excitement. The stars of the sport pushed kiteboarding to new highs in 2023 in their single-minded quest for world titles.

programme.title: Meet Connor Herson
programme.desc: Connor Herson pushes the limits of what is possible on the rock. But his latest and greatest challenge? Balancing a life climbing cutting edge ascents with his studies at Stanford.

programme.desc: The world's best freeriders compete again at this years Freeride World Tour. The second stop takes place in Ordino Arcalís, Andorra on the February 24th.

programme.title: Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Fuwairit (QAT)
programme.desc: Fuwairit Beach is the venue for the Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best freestyle kiteboarders put their skills to the test. With constant wind, this hotspot in Qatar offers the perfect conditions for the competitions.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Sal is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the best wingfoilers in the world will meet for an exciting competition. This paradise in Cape Verde is known for its strong winds and rolling Atlantic waves.

programme.title: Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 - Ibiraquera (BRA)
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the world's best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: The Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 will take place in Jericoacoara, where the world's best wingfoilers will compete against each other. With its legendary winds, this Brazilian jewel offers ideal conditions for high-speed racing.

programme.title: Episode 42
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 42

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2023 - Sibiu (ROU) - 150min LIVEmaniacs Summary
programme.desc: In this year’s anniversary edition, competitors from 55+ nations will be competing, among them the world’s best hard enduro riders like Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP), Michael Walkner (AUT).

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Highlight Show BMX
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the world's largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Highlight Show Skate
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the world's largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.title: New Zealand Winter Games 2022 Episode #02
programme.desc: This will focus on our Continental Cups of Halfpipe and Slopestyle at Cardrona Alpine resort and will feature not only kiwi Olympians, but also Junior World Champions Ruby Andrews and Gustav Legnavsky, as well as international stars.

programme.title: Keep On Keeping On
programme.desc: Keep On Keeping On - Dreaming of Rampage portraits Johny Salidos career and his long way to compete at the Rampage - the holy grail of freeride mountainbiking.

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn Challenger – Zell am See-Kaprun - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: The FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn took place from March 15 to 18, 2025 in Zell am See-Kaprun. At this event as part of the Freeride World Tour qualification series, top freeriders competed against each other on the slopes of the Kitzsteinhorn

programme.title: Episode 42
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 42

programme.title: WOF 2024 #07: Engadin Snow
programme.desc: The ENGADINSNOW by Dakine is widely known as an extraordinary freeride event in front of a backdrop with the fascinating snowy mountain tops of the Swiss Canton of Grisons. This unique parallel freeride format pairs two riders in a team.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: WOF 2024 #08: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Season Wrap Up
programme.desc: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Season Wrap UpIn This weeks episode we take a look at the season wrap up of the European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023. Let´s check out Europes best wavesailors, competing at the bests spots on the Contoinent

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: Most Wanted
programme.desc: New to the line-up this year, veteran Storm Show producer Darrell Miller has teamed up with Full Room Productions’ Ryan Halverson, bringing you more hard-hitting, action-packed, gnar-shredding from the Jackson Hole backcountry.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Big Air Kite & GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships - Gran Canaria (ESP)
programme.desc: Gran Canaria will host the GKA Big Air Kite World Championships and the GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships in July 2024. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the titles and show impressive skills in kiteboarding and wingfoiling.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 13, Jordan
programme.desc: Ten of the world’s strongest men gathered in Amman to compete in Jordan’s first-ever Truck-Pull Championship. The contestants race against the clock while pulling a 21-ton truck across the track. One of the most fierce competitors to take part in the event was four-time winner of the World’s Strongest Man competition, Brian Shaw.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 14, Greece
programme.desc: Taking place in Corinth, Greece, considered by many the cradle of the sports competition games, an epic strongman battle will mark the last stage before the upcoming big two-day season’s finale in Chetumal, Mexico. In front of more than 5000 spectators, the twelve athletes compete in Log Lifts, Card Deadlift, Conan’s Wheel and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E15 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 15, Mexico World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first day of the two-part finale sees the strongest men competing in Carry and Drag, Dumbbell Lift and the Truck Pull. Everything is possible in this heated fight for the crown against the backdrop of stunning Chetumal, Mexico.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E16 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 16, Mexico World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: On the second day of the grand finale of the 2017 Strongman Champions League, the athletes have a last chance to secure the medals in the spectacular four events Weight for Height, Deadlift Cars, Forward Hold and The Loading Medley. Be prepared for stunning performances – and even world records!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 1, Norway - World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: Season 2018 begins with 14 strongest men in the world, all competing for the title. The competition kicks off in Norway. We’ll see typical Viking disciplines, team events and world records in heavy conditions in the land of snow and ice. They will suffer, they will freeze and fight in this first competition of the year for the title that they will carry on their shoulders throughout whole year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 2, Germany - FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capichampions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2018 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 3, Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the first time in history, Strongman Champions League will set up competition in Abu Dhabi. The line-up of super athletes, who are part of the SCL, includes former world champions Dainis Zageris (Latvia) & Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland), current world champion Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and biggest strongman in the World Sean O’Hagan (Ireland).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Strongman classic in land where there is no place for anything else excepts strength, fight and endurance. Here are fourteen of the strongest men, fighting for the title of strongest in Holland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: We go back to Holland, where former champion Dainis Zageris is in leading position after the first three events. Alongside Radzikowski, he is in this moment favorite for world title, and also leader shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 6, Finland
programme.desc: Stage six of Strongman champions league, 2018 is set back on north, in Finland. Here we have Matjaz Belsak, wearing SCL leader shirt, one of the biggest strongman in the World Mika Torro, fan favorite strongman in all over the World – Will Baggott, and also big name from Baltic – Aivars Smaukstelis

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: Twelve strongman, including defending Worldchampion Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia , will compete on “Air spa” for the title of best in homeland country of Tesla, Pupin, Novak Djokovic. Matjaz Belsak is the SCL leader in this competition, chasing his third victory this season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 8, Finland - U105 (Part 1)
programme.desc: The World championship in lightweights of the Strongman Champions League bring to us 50 strongmen from all over the world. All athletes are under 105 kilograms and for them this is the step up to the ultimate heavyweights.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 9, Finland - U105 (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this second stage of the World championship of lightweights we will find out who out of the 12 athletes will win the title in the under 105 kilogram category.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 10, Romania (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of SCL Romania 2018 will be hosted in Brasov. This episode features a new event for Strongman Champion League: “ The Chopper Pull”!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 11, Romania (Part 2)
programme.desc: After three classical Strongman events – Dead lift, Loading and Front hold – and one historical, Chopper Pull for the first time in history of Strongman, now we go to find out who will take title in Romania. This is the second stage in Romania and it remains to be seen who will win the title; Aivars, Travis or Krzyzstof?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 12, Curacao (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next destination of Strongman Champions League is in a piece of paradise on earth – Curacao. We bring to you some special Strongman events like the Rock Lift, Tug of War and Weight for Height in this episode.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 13, Curacao (Part 2)
programme.desc: This is the last competition before the grand finals. After the first three events Zageris is in top place, but can O’Hagan, Baggott, Petursson and Ortmayer step into the final? Last chance some of them will find through events like Forward Hold, Truck Pull, Dead Lift and loading very big objects.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 14, Road to Mexico
programme.desc: We bring you 50 minutes of Strongman inside. Fears, inspiration, courage, the best and worst from our finalists and their expectation of the finals. We also go to Poland and Germany to represent one day in the training of Krzysztof Radzikowski and Dennis Kohlruss. See all the finalists for Mexico in their comfort zone here, with their backgrounds /motivations /family and friends.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 15, Mexico - World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of the Strongman Champions League 2018 finals in Mexico. The last twelve athletes all pushing their boundaries and testing their limits to take the World title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 16, Mexico - World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: After 11 months and 14 competitions all over the world, it all comes down to the final in this episode. The strongmen must show their best skills and every mistake is expensive, so their concentration must be at the highest possible level. Will Krzysztof manage to take off back or will Dainis maintain his lead?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 1, World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: This year 14 athletes from all over the world came to Fefor to compete in 6 cruel events. We'll see typical Viking disciplines on very heavy conditions in land of snow and ice, World records and athletes like the title defender Krzysztof Radzikowski, strongest guys from Holland and Germany and many more

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 SCL S6 Ep2 FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capita in the World and of course, the most powerful host in Strongman champions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2019 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 3, Turkey
programme.desc: On a spectacular beach in Alanya, the MLO Strongman Champions League Turkey was viewed by thousands of spectators over a two day battle. With 12 athletes at the start over 6 cruel events, like Marble Stone Lift, Truckpull and Deadlift cars. And with the comeback of Travis Ortmayer / USA, former stone king and world ranked competitor. Winner of several SCL stages in the past.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Four times Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter competing here in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, and 3 in this episode: The first event, a truckpull of 17.000 kg over 25 meters in max 75 seconds, was a real hard pull Also for the World Champion Truckpull, Holland’s runner-up Kelvin de Ruiter, but watch his amazing technique here.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter, competing in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, 3 in this second episode; a Viking-press of 150 kg with the current world record holder Luke Herrick. The fifth event, a front hold of 25 kg is loved or hated by the athletes and lastly, the Stones of Strength.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 6, Russia
programme.desc: An unbelievable TANK PULL of 50.000 kg was at the stage of SCL RUSSIA. Never seen this before! Not only a tank pull was done here but also the Viking Press/ Deadlift Max and Log lift reps were spectacular events to see here in Russia. With Mikhail Koklyaev also as event presenter, the former top 3 world strongest man from Russia was there

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E07 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: In this year’s edition on The Balkan Peninsula, we have competing the new talent from Estonia Marko Remlik together with Sebastian Kurek from Poland and yellow leader Kelvin de Ruiter

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland and Aivars Smaukstelis from Latvia are the strongman future of these days. Mateusz is the best man in the World at the moment to defeat. Only 25 years and such a fantastic strongman. They come here only for a win. But there are 12 more Strong athletes in this episode who want the title of Finland as well.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E09 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Mateusz Is leading after day 1 (previous episode) with close behind him Aivars Smaukstelis and Zake Muluzi from the UK. All very exciting! 5 events in this episode: Log Lift, Fram Walk, Deadlift, Sack Throw (Weight for Height), Loading medley.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E10 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 10, Portugal
programme.desc: In this stage we have a new strong debutant: Oleg Sylka from the Ukraine. He is the new talent, who will stand up against the old champions like ZSydrunas Savickas and Brian Shaw and the Stoltman Brother from the UK. This new talent Oleg is a great character and we will see him flame in the episode in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E11 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 11, Callio
programme.desc: In Callio is the deepest mine of Europe/ 1500 meter deep, whereas the MLO Strongman Champions League also did 1 event. The Forward Hold, on a 1500 dept/ also a kind of new record/ as it was never done before. Spectacular and new in Strongman sport.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E12 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 12, Ukraine
programme.desc: Kelvin de Ruiter is here to defend his SCL World Truck Pull Championships title. But this year, another strong field wants his title. Over 3 different pulls with 3 different trucks, and 14 athletes at the start, it will be difficult for everybody.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E13 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 13, Caribbean
programme.desc: SCL edition Curacao 2019 was a great event, twelve power boys from all over made a great show at the white beaches, and 35 degrees Celsius heat in the Carrabean Islands. Two events were held on Friday at the beach of beautiful resort Sunscape, the other three were held near the world famous floating bridge at Willemstad on Saturday night.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E14 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 14, Dubai
programme.desc: Hosted at Meydan Grandstand in Dubai, the Strongman Champions League had some really big names in the list like Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland, Brian Shaw from the USA and Krzysztof Radzikowski. In front of the Burj Khalifa the athletes do the deadlift max and 4 other heavy events at another spot in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E15 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. The last stage over 2 episodes of the MLO Strongman Champions League, were held in Porto, Portugal. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E16 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results and this is the final!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: The spectacular Fefor Arena hosted for the 8th time the Worlds Strongest Viking, part of the SCL World Series. But with the absence of former title holders its anyones game. Again, a very spectacular episode of the Strongman Champions League here in Norway.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 2, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: In this episode, the Titan, former double World champion from Latvia will compete against his fellow countryman and the current World champion - Aivars Smaukstelis. With 8 events over 2 stages the contestants are pushed to their limits in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 3, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Dainis Zageris and Aivars Smaukstelis, both from Latvia have a serious, strong battle in the this second and final episode of the SCL Finland 2020. Watch the unbelievable and brute power of these athletes in the last 4 events to crown the winner.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 4, World Record Breakers
programme.desc: The SCL Germany event takes place in an ancient castle called Die Burg in the heart of Germany. Its here where 5 world record attempts take place across 5 different events with 10 athletes. They will go to the max! See this and much more in the SCL Germany 2020.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 5, Strongest Viking
programme.desc: SCL Norway is normally all about snow, wind, and cold weather. Our brave athletes are used to compete under conditions few other athletes have competed in, but after COVID delays the competition has been moved from winter to summer bringing in a whole new range of challenges. With an impressive athlete list who will be the winner across 5 cruel events?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 6, World Strongest Team 1
programme.desc: Were in sunny Finland for the next stage of a double-bill of SCL action, but this time its a team event. A truly fantastic event with 6000 spectators. Even during COVID times this was exceptional! 8 Strong Teams where fighting for the title over a crazy 9 events.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 7, World Strongest Team 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland, done over 9 cruel events. In this episode the last and final 5 events take place. 8 Strong Teams are fighting for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 8, Portugal
programme.desc: The next set of challenges are set in sunny Esposende in Portugal. With stars such as Travis Ortmayer, Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland, and Ervin Toots from Estonia. While Fabio Silva will defend the honour in his own country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E09 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 9, World Records (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are back in Germany, with the world record breakers. We promise you this is going to be amazing. Do not move from that seat, because we are going to see some records smashed today. Over 6 cruel events, you will see who gets crowned of the King Of The Castle!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E10 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 10, World Records (Part 2)
programme.desc: With the next episode of Strongman Champions League Germany. Its the world record breakers, and in the last show we set two new records. Can more be records be broken before the king of the castle is crowned?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E11 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 11, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 1)
programme.desc: Welcome to Kokkola in Finland. This city will be the setting for the Lightweight World championship. Out of 24 athletes, only 16 will make it through to the final day, but who will champion each event and who is going to be eliminated?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E12 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 12, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 2)
programme.desc: Its the second day, and the top 16 athletes have made it through to the final round. With another 4 events to go who will get the crown of world champion?

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A Champ vs. Champ superfight takes place in the main event as GLORY welterweight world champion Chico Kwasi (43-5, 23 KO) puts his title on the line against GLORY lightweight world champ Tyjani Beztati (27-4, 9 KO). In the co-main event, Donovan Wisse (21-1, 10 KO) aims to defend his GLORY middleweight world championship for a fifth time when he welcomes the challenge of top German Sergej Braun (44-13, 27 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Former Light Heavyweight Champion Tarik Khbabez (52-12-1, 22 KO) and Bahram Rajabzabeh (72-5, 63 KO) collide in a huge showdown for the vacant Light Heavyweight title. The penultimate round of the Last Heavyweight Standing tournament resumes with eight heavyweights competing in two separate four-man one-night tournaments. Notable participants include Levi Rigters (20-3, 10 KO), Nabil Khachab (30-6-1, 4 KO), Rade Opacic (22-7, 17 KO) and Milos Cvjeticanin (14-4, 9 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A five-round heavyweight title eliminator between the number one ranked contender Levi Rigters (18-2, 8 KO) and ‘The Golden Wolf’ Bahram Rajabzadeh (69-3, 61 KO). The winner will face ‘The King of Kickboxing’ Rico Verhoeven (64-10, 21 KO) on December 7 in the main event of COLLISION 7. In the co-main event of the evening, Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (25-4-1, 13 KO) clashes with Nico ‘Big Sexy’ Horta (23-9, 3 KO) in a monster heavyweight clash with big implication for the rankings. Croatian kickboxing legend Mladen Brestovac (55-14-1, 37 KO) will make his final walk to the ring in his hometown of Zagreb. ‘The Scorpion Sting’ will take on newcomer Karim Dian (16-13, 3 KO) to cap off an illustrious...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The main event will see two of the light heavyweight division’s most explosive young prospects clash as Romania’s Stefan Latescu (17-3, 8 KO) faces Turkey’s Cem Caceres (16-1, 13 KO). Belgium based Albanian Berjan Peposhi (29-4, 16 KO) will compete in the co-main event. The always exciting featherweight welcomes rising star Ayoub Bourass (14-1, 4 KO) in to make his GLORY debut. International Muay Thai superstar Youssef Boughanem (188-43-8, 120 KO) returns for his sophomore GLORY outing against tough Italian Angelo Volpe (38-5, 12 KO). Former middleweight title contender Serkan Ozcaglayan (45-10, 36 KO) takes on Antwerp’s own Jente Nnamadim (21-5, 11 KO), who comes in to make his GLORY...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The welterweight superfight between former GLORY world champion Endy Semeleer (36-2, 18 KO) and current GLORY lightweight world champion Tyjani Beztati (26-4, 9 KO) will take center stage in the main event of the evening. After dominating the lightweight division, Beztati moves up to welterweight for the very first time in his GLORY career. programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Dean Schmeichel has been coaching for over 20 years. Despite the allure of working as a full time wrestling coach in the martial arts industry, he has instead dedicated himself to work with kids and coaching school sports. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: This episode features two fighters who appear later in this series on the Emelianenko Vs Lindland PPV bill. Here, get a first look at the undefeated Eddie Alvarez as he fights Derrick Noble. And the hard-punching Amanda Buckner takes on well-rounded brawler Shayna Baszler.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athlete's success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Craig Wilson as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH

programme.desc: Mike Short comes from a history of street fighting and recognizes the importance of training and discipline. He has been coaching Boxing for many years and relishes the fact that his entire family comes together at his events, run out of Dekada Gym.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coach Brian Bird takes immense pride in his work, not only with competitive fighters, such as UFC Veteran Nick Ring, but with every athlete who enters his gym. His background is in Karate and Kung Fu. However, watching the first UFC event convinced him that he needed to incorporate grappling and Jiu Jitsu into his coaching arsenal. He now runs a well respected MMA club as a family business... and he most enjoys teaching grappling.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Antonio "Junior" Silva has dominated every one of his fights. Eric Pele may be the underdog, but he's riding his own winning streak. It's an earthquake when a 32-pound unstoppable force meets a 300-pound unmovable object. Roger Gracie is already at the top of the heap in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and submission wrestling, now he's fighting MMA for the first time. He puts his reputation on the line as he faces Ron Waterman.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: A well-known name on the Russian MMA circuit, this fight is Martin Malhosyan's first chance at North American exposure. Stopping this dangerous fighter won't be easy, but Mike Patt's devastating submission win from series 1 proves he's ready. Wisniewski's development as a fighter was a family affair, as he and his brother watched tapes of MMA battles then trained in the front yard. Oganov honed his skills in Serbia, while enrolled in the Red Army.

programme.title: Veere Di Wedding
programme.desc: Childhood friends Kalindi, Avni, Sakshi, and Meera reunite for Kalindi's wedding. Kalindi, hesitant due to her parents' troubled marriage, calls off the wedding amidst the chaos of Rishabh’s loud family. Avni, a lawyer, faces pressure from her single mother to marry. Sakshi seeks divorce from her husband Vineet, and Meera's marriage to John, a foreigner, is unaccepted by her uncle. Together, the friends help each other resolve their issues.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Tutak Tutak Tutiya
programme.desc: Krishna, a city bachelor, wishes to get married to a modern, English speaking girl but ends up with village belle Devi. The newlyweds return to Mumbai and rent out a house as Krishna is too ashamed to introduce his wife to his friends. The house is haunted by the ghost of its previous owner Ruby, an ambitious starlet. She possesses Devi to fulfill her impending dream of becoming a popular actress. Krishna’s predicament forms the rest of the story.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E90 Jodha Akbar S3 E90
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Cheeni Kam
programme.desc: Cheeni Kum is a heartwarming romantic drama centered on Buddhadev Gupta, a grumpy 64-year-old chef who runs a top Indian restaurant in London. His life takes a turn when he clashes with Nina Verma, a spirited 34-year-old who critiques his cooking. Realizing his mistake, he apologizes, and the two gradually fall in love despite their 30-year age gap. When Buddhadev travels to Delhi to ask Nina's father for her hand, he is shocked and refuses, disturbed by their age difference—especially since Buddhadev is older than him. In protest, Nina’s father begins a satyagraha (fast unto death). The story explores love, age, societal norms, and emotional courage.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E302 This is Fate S1 E302
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.
